desc: Lifestyle Sports is the leading factory outlet for sportswear in the greater Wellington area specialising in footwear and sports apparel. With big brands like: Adidas, Reebok, Asics, New Balance, Mizuno, Converse, Russell, Puma, Brooks, Sup2, Arby n Opal, Mitchell n ness, Majestic, 47, Vans, Dr Martens, Skechers.....

layout.text: See us for the best quality and range of licensed sportswear, including hard to find items
